CustomAction.Code: CharacterSettings.Instance.SkinMobs = true;
CharacterSettings.Instance.LootMobs = true;
Log(Color.GreenYellow, "Welcome to [PB] Leatherworking + Skinning 1- 500");
Skinning = Me.GetSkill(Styx.SkillLine.Skinning).CurrentValue;
Log("Im a Worgen. Skinning Level increaced by 15");
Skinning = Skinning + 15;
Log("Skinning Level is "+Skinning+"");
Log("Leatherworking level is "+Leatherworking.Level+"");
